api_list.name: URL Matrics Signle
api_list.description: Get  DA , PA And Spam Score of the single url at a time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://da-pa-and-spam-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/check-url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "da-pa-and-spam-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://da-pa-and-spam-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/check-url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "da-pa-and-spam-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
